trans-unit.source: Invoking a procedure using the CALL command

seg-source.mrk: Invoking a procedure using the CALL command

target.mrk: Invoking a procedure using the CALL command

trans-unit.source: If a procedure uses only IN parameters, can execute the procedure by using the SQL CALL command. A stored procedure with IN, OUT, or INOUT parameters can be invoked from a client application by using a CallableStatement.

seg-source.mrk: If a procedure uses only IN parameters, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can execute the procedure by using the SQL CALL command.
A stored procedure with IN, OUT, or INOUT parameters can be invoked from a client application by using a CallableStatement.

target.mrk: If a procedure uses only IN parameters, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can execute the procedure by using the SQL CALL command.
A stored procedure with IN, OUT, or INOUT parameters can be invoked from a client application by using a CallableStatement.

trans-unit.source: You can invoke the procedure in an SQL statement such as the following:

seg-source.mrk: You can invoke the procedure in an SQL statement such as the following:

target.mrk: You can invoke the procedure in an SQL statement such as the following:

trans-unit.source: You can roll back a CALL statement only if no commits or rollbacks occur within the specified procedure.

seg-source.mrk: You can roll back a CALL statement only if no commits or rollbacks occur within the specified procedure.

target.mrk: You can roll back a CALL statement only if no commits or rollbacks occur within the specified procedure.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the CALL command to execute a routine that returns a value, but you will not be able to access the value.

seg-source.mrk: You can also use the CALL command to execute a routine that returns a value, but you will not be able to access the value.

target.mrk: You can also use the CALL command to execute a routine that returns a value, but you will not be able to access the value.
